name: Perfect Facebook
description:
A transparent and modern style for Facebook, which also cleans up the interface, removes ads and allows for easy customization of background images.
How To Change Background Image 1. Click on the 'Customize Settings' button above. 2. Either select one of the presets, or provide a URL link to your own image. 3. Select how the background image should align (default is top). 4. Click 'Update Style' - or if that doesn't work, uninstall and reinstall the style.
